main.name: Petra Kirschner
main.occupation: potential employee, seeking for new challenges
main.description: Roll down to see my bio, works, experiences and skills
main.bio: I have experiences mostly in event and concert organizing, but now I am open for new challenges, yearning to learn more, and ready to jump out of my comfort zone.I have organized and worked for several pop festivals all over the country, organized and managed numerous concerts, worked for large event organizing companies, did booking management and brand management for an A-listed hungarian band and earlier I have been working on city branding as well. I learnt how to manage a project, how to delegate tasks and lead a team well, how to negotiate and business hard and also how to be accurate at administration and contracting.
main.contactmessage1: I hope our business relationship will continue in the future.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Booking Manager
work.description: Concert organizing and sales associate for a large Hungarian band. Included job duties:
work.description1: • Organizing 5-10 concerts for 100-2000 people per month with a budget of approx 500 000 – 1 000 000 thousand forints
work.description2: • Organization of annual/semi-annual plans, negotiation, business,
work.description6: • Outstanding outcome: Intim Torna Illegál, 20.06.2019., 1500 people, budget: approx 2 000 000 forints.

work.title: Program/Concert organizer
work.description: Program and concert organizer, program coordinator at a central event venue of Budapest. Included job duties:
work.description1: • Organizing 8-20 concerts for 500-1500 people per month with costings of approx 200 000-500 000 forints, in a 10-people team,
work.description2: • Preparation of an annual and semi-annual program plan,
work.description3: • Continuous monitoring of the market, market research,
work.description5: • Event managment, keeping in touch with domestic and foreign partners, attending professional conferences
work.description6: • Outsanding outcome: The Four Owls (UK), 26.04.2019. Akvárium Klub, 600 people with the budget of approx 800 000 forints.

work.title: Program organizer/coordinator
work.description: Organizing 10-50 concerts and cultural events per month for 4 venues, approximately for 100-600 people in a 5-people team with a costing of 100 000 -300 000 forints. Included job duties:
work.description1: • Preparation of an annual and semi-annual program plan,
work.description4: • Complete management of the online communication,
work.description6: • Attending professional conferences, overseeing and analyzing foreign markets
work.description7: • Outstanding outcome: University of Pécs, Student Festival, (Pécsi Egyetemi Napok, April 2018. Approx 4 000 people, with a budget of approx 5 000 000 forints, Halott Pénz concert, September 2017, approx 10 000 people, Széchenyi tér, Pécs, with a budget of approx 2 000 000 forints.

testimonials.text: We have been working together with Petra on festivals for 3-4 years. She is conscious, motivated, serious about her work, and working with heart and soul. Her vast and diverse experience distinguishes her from her collegues of her age-group and the consideration, concentration and calmness that is rare in our environment. These qualities are evident both in the preparatory work and in the sharp. She is committed to creating not only successful but meaningful and valuable events.  I hope we have a lot of work to do together in the future as well.
testimonials.userTitle1: OZORA Fesztivál - Dragon Nest Stage - promoter
